name: Invoke-Obfuscation VAR++ LAUNCHER OBFUSCATION
description: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via VAR++ LAUNCHER
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:/(?i).*&&set.*(\{\d\}){2,}\\\"\s+?\-f.*&&.*cmd.*\/c/)`
